column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Scary prisoner says : " You got a bald head .
#Text=" Katara says : " He could n't be here , Koko .
#Text=" Koko says : " I wanted to see Aangy ... " Katara says : " Oyaji !
#Text=Aang is in jail .
#Text=The town of Chin says he murdered their leader in a past life .
#Text=" Sokka says : " They say it was Kyoshi .
#Text=" Oyaji says : " Kyoshi ?
#Text=That 's crazy talk !
#Text=I 'll take you to her shrine .
#Text=Maybe something there will help you clear her name .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , uh ... what 's Suki up to ?
#Text=Is she around ?
#Text=" Oyaji says : " Actually , she and the other warriors left to fight in the war .
#Text=You kids had a big impact on Suki .
#Text=She said you inspired her and she wanted to help change the world .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , well ... that 's great .
#Text=" Oyaji says : " This temple was converted into a shrine to Kyoshi .
#Text=The clerics tell us these relics are still connected to her spirit .
#Text=That 's her kimono .
#Text=" Katara says : " She had exquisite taste .
#Text=" Oyaji says : " Please do n't touch !
#Text=" Sokka says : " These fans ... They were her weapons , no ?
#Text=" Oyaji says : " Also refrain from touching the fans .
#Text=" Katara says : " These were her boots ?
#Text=Her feet must have been enormous !
#Text=" Oyaji says : " The biggest of any Avatar .
#Text=" Katara says : " Wait a minute ... big feet ?
#Text=Little footprint ?
#Text=There 's no way – " Sokka says : " Special outfit ?
#Text=Hat and pipe ?
#Text=These things mean anything to you ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're right .
#Text=I 'm sorry .
#Text=Please .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aha !
#Text=There 's no way Kyoshi could have made that footprint .
#Text=And therefore there is nothing linking her to the crime scene .
#Text=" Katara says : " Brilliant , Sokka .
#Text="
